card_text: FLIP: You can target 1 "Shaddoll" card in your GY; add it to your hand.$NIf this card is sent to the GY by a card effect: You can target 1 monster on the field; change its battle position. (Flip monsters' effects are not activated at this time, except "Shaddoll" monsters'.) You can only use 1 "Shaddoll Hound" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
